    Black Aracnia noticed it first, then Tarantulas. Killfest and several of 
his men were moving away from the ship. what a perfect oppertunity for an 
attack.
    "Hell Beast, Im going to take a few bots with me on an attack of 
Killfests ship. We might not destroy the ship, but we sure as heck will do 
some damage." She said, smiling.
    "Wait, what if thier secret little mission os to attack us first?" He 
said, a tone of a know-it-all in his voice.
    "Then we shall wait, wont we? If they arrive here, we'll defend, if they 
go someplace else, we'll attack." She snapped back, now watching the monitor 
more closely.

    Ominous watched too as Killfest and his men began to leave the ship. IT 
was a good chance to attack, but he didnt have Quasar yet. And he wanted 
Darkmouse, and from what he recived over picked up transmissions, she was 
moving out somewhere too. If that was the case, they could just ambush the 
escourt.
